dict.acceptation: （批评、判断等的）标准，准则；规范；

sent.orig: Exergy analysis criterion includes appraisal criterion and analysis criterion.
sent.trans: 分析准则包括评价准则和分析准则两类。

sent.orig: According to cognitive result criterion and cognitive capacity criterion, we evaluate the effects of academic exchange.
sent.trans: 本文运用认知结果标准和认知能力标准对学术交流成效进行评价。

sent.orig: With reference to the foreign relative criterion, a recommendation of blast vibration safety criterion is presented.
sent.trans: 在此基础上，结合国外有关标准，提出了爆破振动安全判据的初步建议。

sent.orig: L. Raabe criterion and J. Bertrand criterion, and they are the further expansion of them.
sent.trans: 这组判别法是比拉贝(J.L.Raabe)判别法和伯尔特昂(J.Bertrand)判别法更为有效的方法，也是这两个判别法的进一步推广。

sent.orig: The constituting mode of accounting criterion influences the quality of accounting criterion directly.
sent.trans: 会计准则制定模式直接影响著会计准则的质量。
